body:
Quick Question?
If I was to buy Diamond Rank would my Diamond Rank overwrite my Media Rank?
body_tagged:
Quick Question?
If I was to buy Diamond Rank would my Diamond Rank overwrite my Media Rank?
title: Question?

replies.body:
Staff ranks (i.e: Media) generally overwrite donator ranks. Only the highest rank will be shown ingame.
Rant: And stop with the requesting locks for topics where the question got answered. Maybe other players have questions regarding the ranks and what gets overwritten and which are shown. They have to create a new thread, just because the old one got locked. The forums are there to have discussions and there can't be a discussion when every thread gets locked after 4 replies.
